original_text: With your own eyes, you will see the king. He will be great and beautiful. You will see the land that he rules. It will reach far and wide. With your own eyes, you will see the king. He will be great and beautiful. You will see the land that he rules. It will reach far and wide. With your own eyes, you will see the king. He will be great and beautiful. You will see the land that he rules. It will reach far and wide. With your own eyes, you will see the king.
korean_text: 네 눈은 왕을 그의 아름다운 가운데에서 보며 광활한 땅을 눈으로 보겠고

sentences.original_text: With your own eyes, you will see the king.
sentences.korean_translation: 네 눈으로 왕을 보게 될 것이다.

sentences.original_text: He will be great and beautiful.
You will see the land that he rules.
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 다스리는 땅을 보게 될 것이다.

sentences.original_text: It will reach far and wide.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 땅은 멀리 넓게 뻗어 나갈 것이다.
